channel.title: 667 loading 711 Client Help!
channel.description:
Link to SERVER AND CLIENT: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,539463.0.html My problem is the client.... I have jre7 and jdk7 like im supose to but when i login, the client freezes when it says "Loading Please Wait..." On the top left corner. I checked the console and it says i logged in then i waited a while then i logged out.... Someone please help
Some Pics Console: [IMG]http://i894.photobucket.com/albums/ac149/pure360/Problem2.jpg[/img] Client: [IMG]http://i894.photobucket.com/albums/ac149/pure360/Problem1.jpg[/img]
